td.p: In the left frame all pages are listed. Select one of them an the right frame will appear.
The right frame shows all information on the selected page.
Box No. 1 lists all targets for the current page. If you select a target, you will see it in the Targets page.
Box No. 2 shows all includes used by the current page. With a click on it you will see it in the Includes page.
Box No. 3 contains all images used by the current page. If you want to edit an image, click on it and you will see it in the Images page.
